code: import React,{useState}from'react';import FullCalendar from'@fullcalendar/react';import dayGridPlugin from'@fullcalendar/daygrid';import'../styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calendar=_ref=>{let{availability,setAvailability}=_ref;const handleDateClick=info=>{const clickedDate=info.dateStr;let updatedAvailability;if(availability.includes(clickedDate)){updatedAvailability=availability.filter(date=>date!==clickedDate);}else{updatedAvailability=[...availability,clickedDate];}setAvailability(updatedAvailability);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FullCalendar,{plugins:[dayGridPlugin],initialView:"dayGridMonth",dateClick:handleDateClick,events:availability.map(date=>({title:'Available',date}))});};export default Calendar;
